body.p: The Session Information dialog includes multiple tabs that show important configuration and runtime information for the guest system. The tabs are as follows:

li.p: Configuration Details. Displays the system configuration of the virtual machine in a tabular format. The displayed information includes details such as storage configuration and audio settings.
Runtime Information. Displays runtime information for the guest session in a tabular format similar to the Configuration Details tab.

VM Resource Use. Includes several time series charts which monitor guest resource usage including CPU, RAM, Disk I/O, and Network. Note that the RAM chart requires the Guest Additions to be running on the guest system. The VM Resource Use tab can also be accessed directly from the Resource Dashboard. See .
Guest Control. Details of processes used by the Guest Control File Manager. See .

note.p: For cloud VMs, only the VM Resource Use tab is shown.

body.p: To display session information for a guest VM or a cloud VM, select the VM name in the Machines list and click the VM Resource Use tab.
